bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Illness Sign identical with yan yu jian se 言語蹇澀 . Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry wei ling xian 威靈仙 quoting Hai shi fang 梅師方 : 此藥治丈夫、婦人中風不語，手足不隨，口眼喎斜…，言語 澀滯 , “This medication cured males and females struck by wind. They cannot speak, their hands and feet no longer follow their will. The mouth and eyes are slanted … their language is rough and sluggish”, writes: 此藥治丈夫婦人中風 不語，手足不遂，口眼喎斜，言語蹇滯 , “This medication cures males and females struck by wind. They cannot speak, their hands and feet do no longer follow their will. The mouth and eyes are slanted. Their language is impeded ”.
